text: Jiří Jirmal (24 April 1925 – 11 December 2019) was a Czech jazz classical guitarist and composer. He was born in Prague. Some of his compositions had elements of Brazilian music. He worked for the musical background for Gene Deitch's 1962 Tom and Jerry cartoon Tall in the Trap. Jirmal died in Prague on 11 December 2019 at the age of 94.Zemřel kytarista Jiří Jirmal ==References== ==Other websites== *Jiri Jirmal - guitar player, teacher and composer Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Czech composers Category:Czech guitarists Category:Jazz musicians Category:Musicians from Prague
title: Jiří Jirmal
